We identify 5 previously unknown issues with the accounting for transactions between $IQE and CSC.  Time and again, IQE seems to be employing “having one’s cake and eating it too” accounting.  We feel that IQE dominates CSC, and CSC is therefore likely an alter ego for IQE.

We believe $IQE transactions with JV CSC are not substantive & accounting possibly designed to deceive investors. We estimate IQE transferred PP&E to JV at a valuation 4.6x carrying value. IQE was CSC’s only customer through 2016 & CSC generated negative -105.9% gross margin!

MW is short $IQE LN. We see it as an egregious accounting manipulator. We adjust downward reported net income for 2015 and 2016 down 58.5% & 25.4%. We adjust 1H 2017 net income down by approximately 69%.

In my view, the most egregious accounting at Enron was the stuff that was actually legal (e.g., "prepaids" and swaps that turned ~$4 billion of financing into ~$4 billion of OCF in 2000, which was ~100% of reported OCF). I'm not sure $BABA hews to the law as much as Enron did.
